oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1949-02-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast Saturday February 19, 1949 at 11:30 am. Featuring Clark Reed (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, Tiny and Earl Gulley. Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Clark Reed) -- Opening statement (Eddie Skates) -- Eddie Skates introduces Deacon -- Midnight Train -- Bill's Auto Service commercial (Clark Reed) -- Eddie Skates introduces Earl Gulley -- Darktown Strutters' Ball -- Eddie Skates introduces Deacon -- Brush Those Tears From Your Eyes -- Bill's Auto Service commercial (Clark Reed) -- Eddie Skates introduces the Professor -- Song Of The Islands -- Eddie Skates introduces Deacon and Tiny -- Take Me Back To Tulsa -- Theme -- Closing statement (Eddie Skates) -- Closing statement (Clark Reed)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
